statements: SELECT fan_name, social_media_interactions FROM fan_engagement_data WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, social_media_interactions, event_attendance FROM fan_engagement_data WHERE social_media_interactions > 100;
SELECT fan_name, event_attendance FROM fan_engagement_data WHERE event_attendance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM fan_engagement_data WHERE social_media_interactions < 50;
SELECT fan_id, fan_name FROM fan_engagement_data ORDER BY social_media_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM fan_engagement_data WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT fan_name, social_media_interactions FROM fan_engagement_data WHERE event_attendance = TRUE;
SELECT fan_name, social_media_interactions FROM fan_engagement_data WHERE social_media_interactions > 100 ORDER BY fan_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_fans FROM fan_engagement_data;
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, social_media_interactions FROM fan_engagement_data WHERE social_media_interactions < 50 ORDER BY social_media_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Interactions;
SELECT user_id, post_id, interaction_type FROM Social_Media_Interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_timestamp FROM Social_Media_Interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event_Attendance WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, attendance_status FROM Event_Attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Interactions WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendance_status FROM Event_Attendance WHERE user_id = '87654321-4321-8765-4321-876543218765';
SELECT post_id, interaction_type FROM Social_Media_Interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event_Attendance WHERE attendance_status = true AND event_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM Social_Media_Interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Interactions;
SELECT user_id, platform, interaction_type FROM Social_Media_Interactions WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT interaction_id, platform, interaction_timestamp FROM Social_Media_Interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_name, total_attendees FROM Event_Attendance WHERE total_attendees > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM Esports_Marketing WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, platform, interaction_type FROM Social_Media_Interactions WHERE platform='Twitter' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, total_attendees FROM Event_Attendance WHERE total_attendees > 100 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM Esports_Marketing WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Interactions JOIN Event_Attendance ON user_id = event_id WHERE interaction_type='like' AND total_attendees < 500;

SELECT interaction_id, user_id, platform, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM Social_Media_Interactions WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM Social_Media_Interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5) ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, platform, interaction_type FROM social_media_interactions WHERE platform = 'Twitter'
SELECT event_name, location, capacity FROM event_attendance WHERE capacity > 50
SELECT team_name, region, sponsor FROM esports_teams ORDER BY team_name ASC
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, implementation_date FROM marketing_strategies
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, platform, interaction_datetime FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, location, capacity FROM event_attendance WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY event_datetime DESC;
SELECT team_name, region, sponsor FROM esports_teams WHERE region = 'Europe' OR region = 'North America';
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, implementation_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE engagement_goal = 'Increase Brand Awareness';
SELECT * FROM fan_profiles;
SELECT fan_id, username, email FROM fan_profiles WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_attendance ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, wins, losses, win_percentage FROM team_stats WHERE total_games_played > 50 ORDER BY win_percentage DESC;
SELECT player_name, position, nationality FROM team_roster WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, age FROM fan_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT fan_id, platform, interaction_type FROM social_media_interactions WHERE platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY fan_id ASC;
SELECT event_name, attendance_status FROM event_attendance WHERE event_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, wins, losses, win_percentage FROM team_stats WHERE total_games_played > 50 ORDER BY win_percentage DESC, wins DESC;
SELECT player_name, nationality FROM team_roster WHERE position = 'Forward' ORDER BY nationality, player_name ASC;
